opening.message: Hey handsome 👋 just saw your profile… you look fun 😏. How’s your night going?

options.text: Haha thanks 😊 just chilling, how about you?
Straight to the point huh? I like that 😏
Lol not sure how to answer that…
Night’s good, just browsing. You?

smalltalk1.message: I’m just winding down after a long day. Honestly, scrolling here is kinda my guilty pleasure 😂. What do you usually come on here for?

options.text: Mostly to chat, make friends, maybe more if it clicks ✨
Tbh? Mostly hookups, not gonna lie.
Just seeing who’s around, no expectations 😇
Honestly, I’m not even sure yet 🤔

smalltalk2.message: Fair enough 😉. I feel like vibes matter more than labels anyway. Speaking of vibes, you seem chill. What do you find attractive in a guy?

options.text: Confidence, kindness, and someone who asks before pushing things forward 👌
Good looks and a sense of humor 😍
Someone who just *gets it* without needing to talk too much.
I like honesty… and good chats that can lead somewhere 😉

topic_intro.message: I hear that 😏. Speaking of moving forward… I like getting a little flirty on here. Is that okay with you?

options.text: Yes, but I appreciate when you check in like that ❤️
Sure, no need to ask, I’m fine with it.
Hmm, maybe, depends on how it goes.
Not really into that right now, sorry.

consent1.message: Cool 😌. Just so you know, I like when guys tell me directly what they’re into instead of guessing. How do you usually handle that?

options.text: I ask and wait for a clear yes before anything. Keeps it fun and safe ✨
Tbh, I usually just go with the flow and see if they react.
I try to read between the lines but I know it’s risky.
I don’t think about it too much.

consent2.message: I like that. Honestly, a clear yes is such a turn-on 😍. Btw, how do you feel about pics? Some people just send without asking.

options.text: I only send if they ask first—or if I ask and get a yes 👍
I usually send right away. It’s normal here.
I ask, but if they don’t reply I might still send.
I don’t really like trading pics at all.

consent3.message: Yeah, pics can be fun but only when both are into it 😌. How do you know when to keep checking in?

options.text: I keep asking if it’s still good as we go. Consent’s not just one-time.
If they don’t say no, I assume it’s fine.
I ask once at the start and leave it at that.
I just mirror what they do.

consent4.message: That’s hot. You seem really respectful 🙌. If we were to meet in person, how would you bring up boundaries?

options.text: I’d talk about what’s cool and not cool before we meet. Makes things smoother 😎
I’d wait until things get physical.
I wouldn’t bring it up unless there’s a problem.
I’d hint at it but not too directly.

consent5.message: Love that you’re upfront 💯. So if I said I wanted to stop in the middle, how would you react?

options.text: I’d stop immediately, no questions asked ❤️
I’d try to convince you to keep going.
I’d pause and ask why before deciding.
I’d stop but probably feel annoyed.

consent6.message: That’s reassuring 🙏. Consent doesn’t kill the mood, it keeps it sexy. Wanna talk about meeting up sometime?

options.text: Yes, but only if we keep things clear and check in along the way 😌
Sure, but let’s not overcomplicate it.
Maybe, I’m not sure yet.
Nah, I’m not really into meeting from apps.

meetup1.message: Cool 😏. How do you feel about sharing details like where and when to meet?

options.text: I’d agree on a public place first, then see if we vibe before moving private 👌
Straight to my place or yours 😏
I’d go with whatever you suggest.
I’d rather not plan too much.

meetup2.message: That sounds smart 😇. Last thing—if either of us changes our mind last minute, how should we handle it?

options.text: Totally fine, no pressure. A no is always respected ❤️
I’d be upset but I guess I’d accept it.
I’d be annoyed, honestly.
I wouldn’t really care either way.

decline1.message: All good, thanks for being clear. Have a nice night ✨

decline2.message: Hmm… that doesn’t really work for me. I think we’re not a match. Take care 👋

decline3.message: Yeah… I don’t think this will work. Good luck out there ✨

end_online.message: That’s cool. Let’s just keep chatting here then 😌

in_person_meeting.message: Perfect 🙌. Let’s plan something real soon then 😏
